definition: obese/bloated/swollen (style)/(fig.) (of an organization) oversized or overstaffed

sentences.english: Note how clunky this pull style sheet is.
sentences.chinese: 请注意这个拉样式表多么臃肿。

sentences.english: Cutting back overstaffed organizations and strengthening the legal system are both components of the reform.
sentences.chinese: 消除机构臃肿，加强法制，这些都是改革。

sentences.english: As you can see, this structure is a little clunky.
sentences.chinese: 正如您看到的那样，这种结构有点臃肿。

sentences.english: And Republicans stepped up their attack on the plan as bloated and misdirected .
sentences.chinese: 而共和党人加强了他们对此方案的臃肿和误导的攻击。

sentences.english: Keto's body slowly becomes bloated. Her limbs however stay emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 刻托的身体慢慢变得臃肿，可四肢依旧枯瘦。

sentences.english: Her face is bloated and squarish.
We used to be data poor, now the problem is data obesity.
sentences.chinese: 我们过去是数据匮乏，现在的问题是数据臃肿。

sentences.english: And doesn't bulk up like foam does and everything.
sentences.chinese: 不会像泡沫橡胶那样显得臃肿。

sentences.english: He had been suddenly plonked on top of all the existing already heavy top brass.
sentences.chinese: 他也是一下子被提升到已经臃肿的上层机构中。

sentences.english: They wore shrouds and were often described as bloated and of ruddy or dark countenance.
sentences.chinese: 他们穿寿衣，但往往被臃肿和红润或暗的脸上描述。

sentences.english: It was winter, and I was dressed cumbersomely in a cotton-padded thick gown, staggering ridiculously.
sentences.chinese: 冬天，穿着又厚又臃肿的棉袍，显得蹒跚可笑。

sentences.english: Moreover, the other symptoms, such as impatience, obesity, and natural breath.
sentences.chinese: 其它可见急躁，体胖臃肿，气息均匀。

sentences.english: She tilted her head, admiring the leather shoes on her slightly swollen feet.
sentences.chinese: 边歪着头欣赏穿在略显臃肿的脚上这双鞋。

sentences.english: The main fault that has not changed is the clumsy and inexpressive prose style .
sentences.chinese: 尚未改变的主要缺点是其文体臃肿呆板。

sentences.english: For instance, our departments are overstaffed.
sentences.chinese: 比如，我们现在机构臃肿。

sentences.english: We found a corpulent corpse and a letter of correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 发现里面有一具臃肿的尸体和一封联系信件。

definition: lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
